price: marked by your Lord; this is not far from the evildoers[48].
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ
footnotes: [48] This is a direct warning, especially for the Quraysh who tormented the believers.
